Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: A family-styled Spanish restaurant that serves really great tapas and paella. Everyone in the restaurant made you feel welcomed and relaxed. One of my favourite dinner place in town.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Staff were really friendly. Our food was good but I've had better tapas in Amsterdam. Good value for money though.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Very nice place for a dinner. The ambience is quite Spanish and the service is fast and hospitable. We ordered a grill tapas and the Valencia paella. Both dishes are great in taste. If you want to try some Spanish food, this place worths a try.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Very nice place in a slightly off centre area of Amsterdam. Certainly (on of) the best paella I've had, certainly in the Netherlands. Friendly service, good wine, great food and lovely staff!

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Amazing food, wanna have a good time? First have a great company üòÅ then order different appetizers. For the main meal order anyone for two. All their food was great, very friendly staff. Highly recommended

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: I'd come to celebrate my mother's birthday, and the evening certainly didn't disappoint. Our waitress, Ana, was an excellent host and we would happily come back another time, for another meal!

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Sometimes you just want good,  honest food. Not fancy or pretentious,  but good quality, traditional dishes. This place does it really well, with friendly service as well. Would recommend.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Wonderful experience in each aspect. Amazing food, great ambience and worth every penny. This place has been a favorite of the family for some years whenever we visit Amsterdam, and will be for the years to come.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Nice laid back atmosphere. I had the mix paella and it was delicious. Topped it off with the creme catalan which i would definitely recommend.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: It doesn't compare to the paella I ate in Valencia last winter, but it was tasty non the less. The staff are friendly and price quality wise it is on point.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Really loved the paella!!! Great portion as well! Sangria is also nice!

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: The food was really mediocre and greasy. Personal are friendly. Mostly crowded with 60 years +. Conclusion, overpriced food and wine for what you get. A glass of wine e 5.50. really? Not a place to recommend ...

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: I love It every time I visit here. Awesome food and very friendly service in a lively ambience. Food served very quick. Their alioli with bread is just amazing.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: In my second visit to this cousy and warm place I had the opportunity to try more of their kitchen, all of it delightful, good portions, friendly service, nice sphere, what else can you ask for? Maybe some airco in the summer ; )

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Very cute little Spanish place with authentic cuisine, great wine, and friendly staff.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Best authentic Spanish restaurant in our city. Cooked and served with love. Everything is consistently good.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Great food our party of four shared a paella and it has a really good atmosphere

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Great tapas-like dishes!

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Surprisingly good, only a bit hot inside and would need better protection from kitchen stink, but food is really above average and service is super nice

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Fantastic Spanish food with an awesome atmosphere. Must try the paella.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: The Food was delicious! The Service very gentle! And the restaurant is very ‚Äûhomely‚Äú

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Brilliant Paella! Great Value! Great Food and Service! Great Place!

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Good food. Great atmosphere.  Lovely service. Amazing sangria

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Fantastic Food, we love all. We send a hug from the Portuguese of Madeira Island.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Not a good place to eat. Not tasty, really expensive and the tapas are really really small.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Sangria and tapas were excellent! Had a great evening at this place.

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: Excellent food feel like at home, excellent service

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: (Translated by Google) As a veteran Chinese eater, I was pleasantly surprised from the bread before the meal. The fish soup showed the freshness of the fish from the light. The final seafood risotto also let us not be disappointed. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Beautiful family business where you immediately feel at home. Food of exceptional quality and beautiful wines. Paella the best I have ever eaten outside of Spain. We will definitely come back here! ‚Ä¶

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Eaten for the first time. And I totally enjoyed it. Real Amsterdam including guests and atmosphere meets Spain. Welcoming staff, tasty Spanish beer, tasty 3n especially more than enough food with delicious warm bread ‚Ä¶

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: (Translated by Google) we were with a group, ordered roast pork, shrimp, paella meat and with shrimp, salad, lamb chop, and all sorts of snacks. It was great food. When we were we saw guests from Japan, South Korea, but also Dutch people. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) I can not say anything other than that this was a big disappointment. This food has nothing to do with Spanish cuisine. No idea what all the positive messages are about. What a bummer this restaurant is. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very nice family business, father was in the kitchen and son in the ministry. The squid in tomato sauce is ridiculously tasty and certainly the best paella outside of Spain that you will find. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Had a very nice evening. The tent is authentically decorated and the atmosphere is cozy. The food was very tasty and in generous portions. In addition, very friendly service. Recommended! ‚Ä¶

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Yes the 2nd time was (even) better than the 1st time. Tasty Spanish dishes, well flavored and generous portions. The service was again very attentive and full of humor. Cozy atmosphere with good food. See you soon. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Really delicious really Spanish Restaurant. Gonny and Juan are fantastic hosts and host / chef. Casual and informal atmosphere and lots of fun, many regular customers speak for themselves. :) ‚Ä¶

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: (Translated by Google) One of the best paellas I have ever tasted !! Definitely recommended. Good attention, many options and a cozy atmosphere. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vamos a Ver
Review Text: (Translated by Google) For years one of our favorite restaurants. Very classic Spanish, very well prepared. The owners (he the kitchen, the restaurant) have been friends of ours for years. ‚Ä¶
